item.description:
Note: Due to Salem getting crowded during the month of October, tonight's event will be held at Ryan's place in Danvers.

This event will feature my favorite game, Dominion.

If you already know and love this game, I encourage you to attend. If you've never played and would like to try it (it's really fun and not hard to learn), please join us as well!

I've got the Dominion basic set and Dominion Intrigue. Please let me know if you'll be bringing a copy of Dominion and any expansion sets, and I'll increase the attendee limit as needed.

I (Sandy) will be up for playing until 12:30ish and then I need to go home for my beauty sleep.

---

Snacks:

I'll have some beverages available. Please feel free to bring snacks.

---

About the location:

This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises and the property should be child-friendly.  Look for Unit 901 since Meetup doesn't display addresses correctly! :-(

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Dominion Night in Danvers
